item.title: OpenAI dissolves team focused on long-term AI risks, less than one year after announcing it - CNBC
item.description:
1. OpenAI dissolves team focused on long-term AI risks, less than one year after announcing it  CNBC
  2. Top OpenAI researcher resigns, saying company prioritized 'shiny products' over AI safety  Fortune
  3. OpenAI’s Chief Scientist, Ilya Sutskever, Is Leaving the Company  The New York Times
  4. “I lost trust”: Why the OpenAI team in charge of safeguarding humanity imploded  Vox.com
  5. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman admits "there's no proven playbook" after former alignment lead suggests the company prioritizes "shiny products" like GPT-4o over safety  Yahoo! Voices
